info.name: Fibbonachi Fractal
info.description:
Using Binet's formula, I made complex fibbonachi numbers.
f(0) = 0, f(1)=1, f(2) = 1, f(3) = 2, f(4) = 3, f(5) = 5, f(6) = 8. Any values outside of -5 and 5 diverge, and any values inside converge or cycle. The points in black are points that converge.

renderpass.name: Image
